newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS - Rothschild moves gold market-making to Sydney.
newsitem.headline: RTRS - Rothschild moves gold market-making to Sydney.

text.p: The Singapore gold and silver market making desk of N.M. Rothschild and Sons Ltd has been transferred to Sydney in a move to centralise operations, senior Rothschild gold dealer Mark Freemantle said on Friday.
"Singapore will continue to trade in the physical gold and silver markets," Freemantle told Reuters.
The shift centralises Rothschilds market-making activies in gold and silver in Sydney and London, enabling the the company to take better advantage of different time zones, he said.
The moved involved a single dealer, although there are plans to increase the number of dealers in Sydney, he said.
